    • 3.2 Ï†ÑÌÜµÏ†Å ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî Î¨∏Ï†ú
‚ñº ÎÇ¥Î¶¨Í∏∞

ÌòÑÏû¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî ÎèÑÍµ¨Ïù∏ Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞(Monitor)Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑú ÏïåÏïÑÎ≥∏Îã§.

ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨Îäî Ïã§Ï†úÎ°ú Îß§Ïö∞ Ïò§ÎûòÎêú ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî ÎèÑÍµ¨Ïù¥Îã§. ÌòÑÏû¨ÏóêÎäî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞(monitor)ÎùºÎäî ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî ÎèÑÍµ¨Î•º Ï£ºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©∞, Ïù¥Îäî Ï¢Ä Îçî Í≥†ÏàòÏ§ÄÏùò ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌïúÎã§.

1. Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞ Íµ¨Ï°∞

SemaphoreÏùò Íµ¨Ï°∞Îäî ÏúÑÏôÄ Í∞ôÏïòÎã§. Í∑∏Î†áÎã§Î©¥ monitorÎäî Î¨¥ÏóáÏù¥ Îã§Î•ºÍπå?

ÏúÑÎäî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Ïùò Íµ¨Ï°∞Î•º Í∞ÑÎã®Ìûà ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ∏ Í∑∏Î¶ºÏù¥Îã§. Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Îäî Í≥µÏú† ÏûêÏõê + Í≥µÏú† ÏûêÏõê Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌï®ÏàòÎ°ú Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥Ï†∏ ÏûàÍ≥†, 2Í∞úÏùò ÌÅêÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§. Í∞ÅÍ∞Å mutual exclusion(ÏÉÅÌò∏Î∞∞ÌÉÄ) queue, conditional synchronization(Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞) queueÏù¥Îã§.

  • ÏÉÅÌò∏Î∞∞ÌÉÄ ÌÅêÎäî ÎßêÍ∑∏ÎåÄÎ°ú Í≥µÏú† ÏûêÏõêÏóê ÌïòÎÇòÏùò ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Îßå ÏßÑÏûÖÌïòÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú ÌÅêÏù¥Îã§.
  • Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÎäî Ïù¥ÎØ∏ Í≥µÏú†ÏûêÏõêÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Í∞Ä ÌäπÏ†ïÌïú Ìò∏Ï∂ú wait()ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÎ°ú Îì§Ïñ¥Í∞à Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÏóê Îì§Ïñ¥Í∞Ä ÏûàÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Îäî Í≥µÏú†ÏûêÏõêÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî Îã§Î•∏ ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Ïóê ÏùòÌï¥ Íπ®ÏõåÏ§Ñ Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. Ïù¥ Ïó≠Ïãú Íπ®ÏõåÏ£ºÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§ÏóêÏÑú ÌäπÏ†ïÌïú Ìò∏Ï∂ú notify()ÏùÑ Ìï¥Ï£ºÎ©∞, Íπ®ÏõåÏ£ºÎçîÎùºÎèÑ Ïù¥ÎØ∏ Í≥µÏú†ÏûêÏõêÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Í∞Ä Ìï¥Îãπ Íµ¨Ïó≠ÏùÑ ÎÇòÍ∞ÄÏïº ÎπÑÎ°úÏÜå ÌÅêÏóê ÏûàÎçò ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Í∞Ä Ïã§ÌñâÎêúÎã§.

2. monitor in java

ÏûêÎ∞îÎäî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî ÎåÄÌëúÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ïñ∏Ïñ¥Ïù¥Î©∞, ÏûêÎ∞îÏùò Î™®Îì† Í∞úÏ≤¥Îäî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Í∞Ä Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. Í∑∏Î†áÎã§Î©¥ ÏûêÎ∞îÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏòàÏ†úÎ•º ÏÇ¥Ìé¥Î≥¥Ïûê.

class C {
  private int value, ...;     // Í≥µÏú† Î≥ÄÏàò
  synchronized void Foo() {   // Î∞∞ÌÉÄÎèôÍ∏∞
    // ...
  }
  synchronized void Goo() {
    // ...
  }
  void H() {
    // ...
  }
}

ÏúÑ ÏΩîÎìúÎäî Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî ÌÅ¥ÎûòÏä§Ïù¥Îã§. valueÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Î≥ÄÏàòÎì§ÏùÄ Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÍ∞Ä Í≥µÏú†ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî Î≥ÄÏàòÎ°ú Î≥º Ïàò ÏûàÍ≥†, synchronized ÌÇ§ÏõåÎìúÎäî Î∞∞ÌÉÄÎèôÍ∏∞Î•º ÏàòÌñâÌïòÎäî Ìï®ÏàòÎ•º ÎßêÌïúÎã§. Ï¶â, Ìï¥Îãπ Ìï®ÏàòÏóêÎäî Îã® ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÎßå Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

Foo() Ìï®ÏàòÏôÄ Goo() Ìï®ÏàòÎäî synchronized ÌÇ§ÏõåÎìúÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏÉÅÌò∏Î∞∞ÌÉÄ Ìï®ÏàòÎ°ú ÏÑ†Ïñ∏ÌïòÏòÄÎäîÎç∞, Ïù¥Îäî ‚ÄúÎëò Îã§ Í∞ôÏùÄ ÏûÑÍ≥ÑÍµ¨Ïó≠ÏùÑ Í∞ñÎäîÎã§‚ÄùÎäî ÏùòÎØ∏Ïù¥Îã§. Îã§Ïãú ÎßêÌï¥ÏÑú, Foo() Ìï®ÏàòÏóê Ìïú Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÍ∞Ä ÏàòÌñâ Ï§ëÏù¥ÎùºÎ©¥, Foo() Ìï®ÏàòÎøê ÏïÑÎãàÎùº Goo() Ìï®ÏàòÏóêÎèÑ Îã§Î•∏ Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÎäî Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌï† Ïàò ÏóÜÎã§. Î∞òÎ©¥Ïóê H() Ìï®ÏàòÎäî ÏùºÎ∞ò Ìï®ÏàòÏù∏Îç∞, Ïù¥ Ìï®ÏàòÏóêÏÑúÎäî Í≥µÌÜµ Î≥ÄÏàòÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏Î•º ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÎäîÎã§Îäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÏòàÏÉÅÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. (Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÍ∞Ä ÎèôÏãúÏóê Ï†ëÍ∑ºÍ∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÎã§.)

Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞Îäî ÌäπÏ†ïÌïú Î©îÏÑúÎìú Ìò∏Ï∂úÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

wait(): Ìò∏Ï∂úÌïú Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÎ•º Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÏóê ÏÇΩÏûÖÌïúÎã§. notify(): Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÏóê ÏûàÎäî ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÎ•º Íπ®ÏõåÏ§ÄÎã§. notifyAll(): Ï°∞Í±¥ÎèôÍ∏∞ ÌÅêÏóê ÏûàÎäî Î™®Îì† Ïì∞Î†àÎìúÎ•º Íπ®ÏõåÏ§ÄÎã§.

Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞ Ïó≠Ïãú, ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨ÏóêÏÑú Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í∏∞Îä•Ïù∏ Mutual exclusion, OrderingÏùÑ Î™®Îëê Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. ÏòàÏ†úÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ Ïù¥Î•º ÏÇ¥Ìé¥Î≥¥Ïûê.

3. Problem Solving by Monitor

monitorÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ ÏßÄÍ∏àÍπåÏßÄ Î∞∞Ïö¥ Î¨∏Ï†úÎì§ÏùÑ Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÏïåÏïÑÎ≥¥Ïûê.

3.1 BankAccount Problem

Ïù¥Ï†ÑÏóê ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨ÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¥Ìé¥Î≥∏ ÏùÄÌñâÍ≥ÑÏ¢å Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨ ÎåÄÏã† Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï¥ÏÑú Mutual exclusion, OrderingÏùÑ Íµ¨ÌòÑÌï¥Î≥¥Ïûê.

3.1.1 Mutual Exclusion

class Test {
	public static void main(String[] args)
	throws InterruptedException {
		BankAccount b = new
		BankAccount();
		Parent p = new Parent(b);
		Child c = new Child(b);
		p.start();
		c.start();
		p.join();
		c.join();
		System.out.println( "\nbalance = " + b.getBalance());
	}
}

class BankAccount {
	int balance;
	synchronized void deposit(int amt) {
		int temp = balance + amt;
		System.out.print("+");
		balance = temp;
	}
	synchronized void withdraw(int amt) {
		int temp = balance - amt;
		System.out.print("-");
		balance = temp;
	}
	int getBalance() {
		return balance;
	}
}

class Parent extends Thread {
	BankAccount b;
	Parent(BankAccount b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
	public void run() {
		for (int i=0; i<100; i++)
			b.deposit(1000);
	}
}

class Child extends Thread {
	BankAccount b;
	Child(BankAccount b) {
		this.b = b;
	}
	public void run() {
		for (int i=0; i<100; i++)
			b.withdraw(1000);
	}
}

ÏΩîÎìúÍ∞Ä Îß§Ïö∞ Í∞ÑÎã®Ìï¥Ï°åÎã§..!{:.center-text}

ÏúÑ ÏΩîÎìúÏóêÏÑú Î≥º Ïàò ÏûàÎìØÏù¥, ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† ÎïåÎ≥¥Îã§ Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ Îß§Ïö∞ Í∞ÑÍ≤∞ÌïòÍ≤å ÏΩîÎìúÎ•º Íµ¨ÌòÑÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨Î•º ÏÑ†Ïñ∏ÌïòÍ≥† number of permit Í∞íÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÎäî ÎåÄÏã†, synchronized ÌÇ§ÏõåÎìú ÌïòÎÇòÎ°ú Ïù¥Î•º ÎåÄÏ≤¥Ìïú Í≤ÉÏùÑ Î≥º Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

Ïã§Ìñâ Í≤∞Í≥ºÎäî ÏúÑÏôÄ Í∞ôÍ≥†, balanceÍ∞íÏù¥ Ï†ïÏÉÅÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú 0ÏùÑ Ï∂úÎ†•ÌïúÎã§.

3.1.2 Mutual Ordeing

ÏùÄÌñâÍ≥ÑÏ¢å Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º ÏÇ¥Ìé¥Î≥¥Í∏∞Ï†ÑÏóê, orderingÏùÑ ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î•º Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäîÏßÄ Î≥¥Ïûê.

P1 P2
¬† wait()
section 1 section 2
notify() ¬†

ÏúÑ Íµ¨Ï°∞Îäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§ ÏàúÏÑúÎ•º P1, P2 ÏàúÏÑúÎ°ú Ïã§ÌñâÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏõêÌïòÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞Ïù¥Î©∞, Ïù¥Îäî ÏÑ∏ÎßàÌè¨ÏôÄ Îß§Ïö∞ Ïú†ÏÇ¨Ìïú Í≤ÉÏùÑ Ïïå Ïàò ÏûàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨Î©¥ ÏùÄÌñâÍ≥ÑÏ¢å Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞Î°ú Íµ¨ÌòÑÌïòÎäîÎç∞, ÏûÖÍ∏à Î®ºÏ†Ä ÏàòÌñâ, Ï∂úÍ∏à Î®ºÏ†Ä ÏàòÌñâ, ÏûÖÍ∏à Ï∂úÍ∏à Î∞òÎ≥µ ÏàòÌñâ 3Í∞ÄÏßÄÎ•º Í∞ÅÍ∞Å Íµ¨ÌòÑÌï¥Î≥¥Ïûê. Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† ÏúÑ ÏΩîÎìúÏóêÏÑú ÏàòÏ†ïÌïòÎäî Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÄ ÏàúÏÑúÎ•º Ï†ïÌïòÎäî ÏûÖÍ∏à, Ï∂úÍ∏àÌï®ÏàòÏù¥ÎØÄÎ°ú Ïù¥ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÑ ÎåÄÎ≥ÄÌïòÎäî BankAccountÎßå ÏàòÏ†ïÌïòÏûê.

ÏûÖÍ∏à Î®ºÏ†Ä ÏàòÌñâÌïòÍ∏∞

Î®ºÏ†Ä ÏûÖÍ∏àÏãúÏûëÌïòÎ©¥ Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨ÎùºÍ≥† ÌïòÎ©¥ÎêúÎã§.

class BankAccount {
	int balance;
	synchronized void deposit(int amt) {
		int temp = balance + amt;
		System.out.print("+");
		balance = temp;
		notify();
	}
	synchronized void withdraw(int amt) {
		while (balance <= 0)
			try {
				wait();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {}
		int temp = balance - amt;
		System.out.print("-");
		balance = temp;
	}
	int getBalance() {
		return balance;
	}
}

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
++++++++++++++++++++------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------
balance = 0

Ï∂úÍ∏à Î®ºÏ†Ä ÏàòÌñâÌïòÍ∏∞

Î®ºÏ†Ä Ï∂úÍ∏àÏãúÏûëÌïòÎ©¥ Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨ÎùºÍ≥† ÌïòÎ©¥ÎêúÎã§.

class BankAccount {
	int balance;
	synchronized void deposit(int amt) {
		while (balance == 0)
			try {
				wait();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {}
		int temp = balance + amt;
		System.out.print("+");
		balance = temp;
	}
	synchronized void withdraw(int amt) {
		int temp = balance - amt;
		System.out.print("-");
		balance = temp;
		notify();
	}
	int getBalance() {
		return balance;
	}
}

--------------------++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
balance = 0

ÏûÖÍ∏à Ï∂úÍ∏à Î∞òÎ≥µ ÏàòÌñâÌïòÍ∏∞

ÏûÖÍ∏à ÎÑ£Í≥† Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨Í≥† Ï∂úÍ∏à ÎÑ£Í≥† Í∏∞Îã§Î¶¨Í≥†Î•º Î∞òÎ≥µÌïòÎ©¥ ÎêúÎã§!

class BankAccount {
	int balance;
	boolean p_turn = true;
	synchronized void deposit(int amt) {
		int temp = balance + amt;
		System.out.print("+");
		balance = temp;
		notify();
		p_turn = false;
		try {
			wait();
		} catch (InterruptedException e) {}
	}
	synchronized void withdraw(int amt) {
		while (p_turn)
			try {
				wait();
			} catch (InterruptedException e) {}
		int temp = balance - amt;
		System.out.print("-");
		balance = temp;
		notify();
		p_turn = true;
	}
	int getBalance() {
		return balance;
	}
}

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-
balance = 0

3.2 Ï†ÑÌÜµÏ†Å ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî Î¨∏Ï†ú

10: Ï†ÑÌÜµÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî Î¨∏Ï†úÎì§ÏùÑ ÏàòÏ†ïÌï¥Î≥∏Îã§!

2.1 Producer-Consumer Problem

SemaphoreÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ ÏÉÅÌò∏ Î∞∞Ï†ú sem, Í∞ÄÎìù Ï∞®ÏûàÏùÑ Îïå blockÌïòÎäî sem, ÎπÑÏñ¥ÏûàÏùÑ Îïå blockÌïòÎäî sem Ï¥ù 3Í∞úÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌñàÏñ¥Ïïº ÌñàÎã§. ÌïòÏßÄÎßå Ïù¥Î≤àÏóêÎäî ÏΩîÎìúÍ∞Ä Í∞ÑÎã®Ìï¥ÏßÑÎã§!

class Buffer {
    int[] buf;
    int size, count, in, out;
    Buffer(int size) {
        buf = new int[size];
        this.size = size;
        count = in = out = 0;
    }

    synchronized void insert(int item) {
        while (count == size)
            try {
                wait();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {}
        buf[in] = item;
        in = (in+1)%size;
        notify();
        count++;
    }

    synchronized int remove() {
        while (count == 0)
            try {
                wait();
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {}
        int item = buf[out];
        out = (out+1)%size;
        count--;
        notify();
        return item;
    }
}

class Producer extends Thread {
    Buffer b;
    int N;
    Producer(Buffer b, int N) {
        this.b = b; this.N = N;
    }
    public void run() {
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
            b.insert(i);
    }
}

class Consumer extends Thread {
    Buffer b;
    int N;
    Consumer(Buffer b, int N) {
        this.b = b; this.N = N;
    }
    public void run() {
        int item;
        for (int i=0; i<N; i++)
            item = b.remove();
    }
}

class Test {
    public static void main(String[] arg) {
        Buffer b = new Buffer(100);
        Producer p = new Producer(b, 10000);
        Consumer c = new Consumer(b, 10000);
        p.start();
        c.start();
        try {
            p.join();
            c.join();
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {}
        System.out.println("Number of items in the buf is " + b.count);
    }
}

Number of items in the buf is 0

2.2 The Dining Philosopher Problem

class Philosopher extends Thread {
    int id; // philosopher id
	Chopstick lstick, rstick;
    Philosopher(int id, Chopstick lstick, Chopstick rstick) {
        this.id = id;
        this.lstick = lstick;
        this.rstick = rstick;
    }

    public void run() {
        try {
            while (true) {
                lstick.acquire();
                rstick.acquire();
                eating();
                lstick.release();
                rstick.release();
                thinking();
            }
        }catch (InterruptedException e) { }
    }

    void eating() {
        System.out.println("[" + id + "] eating");
    }
    void thinking() {
        System.out.println("[" + id + "] thinking");
    }
}

class Chopstick {
    private boolean inUse = false;
    synchronized void acquire() throws InterruptedException {
        while (inUse)
            wait();
        inUse = true;
    }
    synchronized void release() {
        inUse = false;
        notify();
    }
}

class Test {
    static final int num = 5; // number of philosphers & chopsticks
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int i;
        /* chopsticks */
        Chopstick[] stick = new Chopstick[num];
        for (i=0; i<num; i++)
            stick[i] = new Chopstick();
        /* philosophers */
        Philosopher[] phil = new Philosopher[num];
        for (i=0; i<num; i++)
            phil[i] = new Philosopher(i, stick[i], stick[(i+1)%num]);
        /* let philosophers eat and think */
        for (i=0; i<num; i++)
            phil[i].start();
    }
}
